attributes.action: Audit of MCCD where COVID-19 is mentioned for the period 01/09/20 to 30/11/20
attributes.additional_details: To ensure future policy is appropriate and effective it is crucial that the factors causing deaths are accurately identified and the extent of their impact established.
attributes.background:
Please confirm the quality and accuracy of MCCD completion for the specificied period. 
Particularly confirm that
a. Where COVID-19 is mentioned, that mention is warranted, and;
b. Where COVID-19 is the Underlying Cause of Death, that this is correct and beyond reasonable doubt.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551788
